field_provus_body.value:
Meridian County agendas are publicly available.  The agendas outline the order of business for county commission meetings. The agenda is used to inform the public and the commission members of the issues to be presented and discussed during the meetings.

Getting on the Agenda A deadline for each agenda is set and posted by county commission to allow for sufficient time for review.  To get an item placed on the agenda, residence should contact Commission Office to request their item be added to the agenda.

Getting on the Agenda A deadline for each agenda is set and posted by county commission to allow for sufficient time for review.  To get an item placed on the agenda, residence should contact Commission Office to request their item be added to the agenda.
